Html:
Hi,

I am using locbaml.exe for my WPF localization. I have two usercontrol dlls ( A.dll & B.dll). When i use locbaml, i am getting two localized satellite dlls ( A.resources.dll and B.resources.dll). Everything works fine. But is it possible to have a single resources.dll for both my usercontrol dlls using locbaml ?

 

Regards,

Bhupesh.
